keyTakeAways: The Tiny Desk Carousel features a collection of featured Tiny Desk Concerts.
The concert series highlights musical performances in a minimalist, intimate setting, promoting accessibility and creativity in live music.

summaryOfNewsArticle: This article features a collection of featured Tiny Desk Concerts from NPR, highlighting musical performances in an intimate, accessible format. The concerts, scheduled and published on February 28, 2024, at 2:20 PM EST, showcase diverse artists and genres, promoting public engagement with live music and cultural expression through NPR's public broadcasting platform.
